title: Better For Baseball?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss their biggest takeaways from the Bills’ win over the Rams last night, if the new MLB rules will make Baseball better and David Pollack joins the show for 5 Good Minutes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
